DOC.brief_summary: To answer question whether previously detect breath profile patient suffer obstructive sleep apnoea ( OSA ) find cohort patient suspect OSA use mass spectrometry ( validation study ) .
DOC.brief_title: Mass Spectral Fingerprinting Obstructive Sleep Apnoea
DOC.criteria: Clinical suspicion obstructive sleep apnoea syndrome ( base clinical symptom increase daytime sleepiness ; Epworth Sleepiness Score ( ESS ) > 10 ) . Age 18 85 year study entry .
